fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives: The organisation follows the foreign policy of the EU in its target countries, which span across the whole world. We follow the activities of the European Parliament, EEAS and European Commission, as well as discussions and decisions of the Council of the EU.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
EU-Cuba-Network 
European Burma Network 
Protect Defenders 
FRII (Swedish Fundraising Association) 
Defend Defenders 
Swedish Civil Society Network for Eastern Partnership Countries 
Civil Liberties Union for Europe
goals__remit:
Civil Rights Defenders defends people’s civil and political rights in pursuit of our vision. We partner with and support human rights defenders who work in some of the world’s most repressive regions. 
 
Through advocacy, litigation, and public campaigns, we advance people’s rights globally. We also act as Sweden’s local civil rights watchdog group.
